title: Yossi Amrani
text:
Yossi Amrani (born Haifa, 1958) is an Israeli diplomat who is the <a href="List%20of%20ambassadors%20of%20Israel%20to%20Greece">Israeli Ambassador to Greece</a>.
Biography.
Amrani earned a BA and MA cum laude in history from the <a href="University%20of%20Haifa">University of Haifa</a> and the <a href="Hebrew%20University%20of%20Jerusalem">Hebrew University of Jerusalem</a>, respectively.
